1. Navigate to the `recipes` repository using the command line.
1. Create a new branch called `feature/rebase-exercise`.
1. Switch to the new branch.
1. Make any change to any of the files in your project directory.
1. Stage the changes.
1. Commit the your staged changes.
1. Switch back to the main branch
1. Make any change to any of the files in your project directory.
1. Stage the changes.
1. Commit the your staged changes.
1. Switch back to the `feature/rebase-exercise` branch
1. Rebase the commit of the `feature/rebase-exercise` branch onto your `main` branch.
1. Verify that the commits from `feature/rebase-exercise` are now on top of the commits from `main`.
